title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 936.3 - Basis for extension
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 936.3 - Basis for extension

State Regulations
A Covered Individual may be granted an extension of time
within which to file a Financial Disclosure Statement with the Commission only
upon a showing of: (a) Justifiable
cause; or
(b) Undue
hardship. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
936.3

Amended

New

York State Register June 6, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 23, eff. 6/6/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
